bakalib.utils module¶

util¶

exception bakalib.utils.BakalibError¶

Bases: Exception

Exception subclass, used for differentiating between Python exceptions and bakalib exceptions

class bakalib.utils.Base¶

Bases: object

Base class for most of the classes present in this library

request(**kwargs: str) → dict¶

Generic request method

Parameters

  • gethx (str, optional) – Name of the client

  • hx (str, optional) – Access token

  • pm (str, optional) – Module name

  • pmd (str, optional) – Module arguments

Raises

BakalibError – If received response is invalid

Returns

Received response

Return type

dict
